description: Semcon AB engages in the provision of product development services and product information. The company is headquartered in Goeteborg, Vastra Gotalands and currently employs 1,898 full-time employees.  The firm specializes in two areas: Engineering services, offering product and production development, as well as plant and facility design; and Product information, supporting product distribution, and online market communication, among others. Its activities are divided into three segments: Automotive Research and Development, which offers services to the automotive industry, including design, calculation, testing and simulations; Design & Development, which is responsible for industrial and plant design, as well as production and product development; and Informatic, which provides information solutions for the aftermarkets and interactive market communication. The firm operates Semcon Forvaltnings AB, Semcon Informatic AB, Semcon International AB and Kongsberg Devotek AS as subsidiaries.
name: Semcon AB
